sen.j: 曽爾高原（そにこうげん）は、奈良県宇陀郡曽爾村大字太郎路にある高原。
sen.e: Soni Plateau is located in Oaza Taroji, Soni-mura, Uda County, Nara Prefecture.
Soni Plateau is located in Oaza Taroji, Soni-mura, Uda County, Nara Prefecture.
Soni Plateau is located in Oaza Taroji, Soni-mura, Uda County, Nara Prefecture.

sen.j: 当高原は室生赤目青山国定公園第一種特別地域内にある。
sen.e: This plateau is within the Class 1 special district of Muro Akame Aoyama Quasi-National Park.
This plateau is within the Class 1 special district of Muro Akame Aoyama Quasi-National Park.
This plateau is within the Class 1 special district of Muro Akame Aoyama Quasi-National Park.

sen.j: 概要
sen.e: Summary
Summary
Summary

sen.j: 曽爾高原にある山は亀山といい849mの高さがある。
sen.e: A mountain on the Soni Plateau is called Mt. Kame and is 849 meters in height.
A mountain on the Soni Plateau is called Mt. Kame and is 849 meters in height.
A mountain on the Soni Plateau is called Mt. Kame and is 849 meters in height.

sen.j: 秋にはススキが咲く。
sen.e: Japanese pampas grass blooms in autumn.
Japanese pampas grass blooms in autumn.
Japanese pampas grass blooms in autumn.

sen.j: 春になると山焼きも行われ、高原のすすきが真っ黒になる姿は驚きである。
sen.e: After the dead grass is burnt off the hill in spring, stunning scenery of the plateau covered with black Japanese pampas grass can be found.
After the dead grass is burnt off the hill in spring, stunning scenery of the plateau covered with black Japanese pampas grass can be found.
After the dead grass is burnt off the hill in spring, stunning scenery of the plateau covered with black Japanese pampas grass can be found.

sen.j: 主に関西圏からのハイキングが多い。
sen.e: The plateau attracts many hikers mainly from Kansai area.
The plateau attracts many hikers mainly from Kansai area.
The plateau attracts many hikers mainly from Kansai area.

sen.j: 交通
sen.e: Transportation
Transportation
Transportation

sen.j: バス
sen.e: By bus
By bus
By bus

sen.j: 三重交通が、4月1日から11月30日までの土休日と9月25日から11月30日までの平日に、名張駅から曽爾高原行きのバスを運行している。
sen.e: Mie Kotsu Co., Ltd. provides bus service from Nabari Station to Soni Plateau, on Saturdays and holidays from April 1 to November 30 and on weekdays from September 25 to November 30.
Mie Kotsu Co., Ltd. provides bus service from Nabari Station to Soni Plateau, on Saturdays and holidays from April 1 to November 30 and on weekdays from September 25 to November 30.
Mie Kotsu Co., Ltd. provides bus service from Nabari Station to Soni Plateau, on Saturdays and holidays from April 1 to November 30 and on weekdays from September 25 to November 30.

sen.j: しかしバス停から高原までは、1kmほど歩かなければならない。
sen.e: However, visitors have to walk about one kilometer from the bus stop to the plateau.
However, visitors have to walk about one kilometer from the bus stop to the plateau.
However, visitors have to walk about one kilometer from the bus stop to the plateau.

sen.j: 奈良交通も榛原駅から10月15日～10月29日までの日祝日に臨時バスを運行している。
sen.e: Nara Kotsu Bus Lines Co., Ltd. also operates special bus service from Haibara Station, on Sundays and public holidays from October 15 to 29.
Nara Kotsu Bus Lines Co., Ltd. also operates special bus service from Haibara Station, on Sundays and national holidays from October 15 to 29.
Nara Kotsu Bus Lines Co., Ltd. also operates special bus service from Haibara Station, on Sundays and national holidays from October 15 to 29.

sen.j: その他に太郎路バス停から、徒歩60分でも行ける。
sen.e: The plateau is also accessible by a 60-minute walk from Taroji Bus Stop.
The plateau is also accessible by a 60-minute walk from Taroji Bus Stop.
The plateau is also accessible by a 60-minute walk from Taroji Bus Stop.

sen.j: こちらのバスは通年運行。
sen.e: In this case, year-round bus service is available.
In this case, year-round bus service is available.
In this case, year-round bus service is available.

sen.j: その他にも名張駅発御杖村方面のバスでもアプローチが可能。
sen.e: In addition, the plateau can be accessed by bus leaving Nabari Station for Mitsue Village.
In addition, the plateau can be accessed by bus leaving Nabari Station for Mitsue Village.
In addition, the plateau can be accessed by bus leaving Nabari Station for Mitsue Village.

sen.j: マイカー
sen.e: By car
By car
By car

sen.j: 大阪方面
sen.e: From Osaka
From Osaka
From Osaka

sen.j: 名阪国道針インターチェンジで下車し、国道369号を南へ行き曽爾村に入り三重県道・奈良県道81号名張曽爾線経由で、曽爾高原に到着できる。
sen.e: Soni Plateau can be accessed by exiting the Meihan National Route at the Hari Interchange, driving south on National Route 369 to enter the village of Soni, and then taking Mie and Nara Prefectural Road No. 81 Nabari Soni Route.

Soni Plateau can be accessed by exiting the Meihan National Route at the Hari Interchange, driving south on National Route 369 to enter the village of Soni, and then taking Mie and Nara Prefectural Road No. 81 Nabari Soni Route.

Soni Plateau can be accessed by exiting the Meihan National Route at the Hari Interchange, driving south on National Route 369 to enter the village of Soni, and then taking Mie and Nara Prefectural Road No. 81 Nabari Soni Route.

sen.j: 2006年8月4日に栂坂バイパスが開通。
sen.e: Tsugasaka Bypass opened on August 4, 2006.
Tsugasaka Bypass opened on August 4, 2006.
Tsugasaka Bypass opened on August 4, 2006.

sen.j: 2004年12月2日には曽爾バイパス。
sen.e: Soni Bypass opened on December 2, 2004.
Soni Bypass opened on December 2, 2004.
Soni Bypass opened on December 2, 2004.

sen.j: 2004年6月1日に榛原バイパスがそれぞれ開通し数年前よりも大阪方面からのアプローチが便利になった。
sen.e: Haibara Bypass opened on June 1, 2004, and these newly opened bypasses allow better access from Osaka and surrounding areas than several years ago.
Haibara Bypass opened on June 1, 2004, and these newly opened bypasses allow better access from Osaka and surrounding areas than several years ago.
Haibara Bypass opened on June 1, 2004, and these newly opened bypasses allow better access from Osaka and surrounding areas than several years ago.

sen.j: 名古屋方面
sen.e: From Nagoya
From Nagoya
From Nagoya

sen.j: 名阪国道上野インターチェンジで下車し、伊賀市、名張市を経由し、三重県道・奈良県道81号名張曽爾線に入り曽爾高原に到着できる。
sen.e: Soni Plateau can be accessed by exiting the Meihan National Route at the Ueno Interchange, passing through Iga and Nabari Cities, and then taking Mie and Nara Prefectural Road No. 81 Nabari Soni Route.

Soni Plateau can be accessed by exiting the Meihan National Route at the Ueno Interchange, passing through Iga and Nabari Cities, and then taking Mie and Nara Prefectural Road No. 81 Nabari Soni Route.

Soni Plateau can be accessed by exiting the Meihan National Route at the Ueno Interchange, passing through Iga and Nabari Cities, and then taking Mie and Nara Prefectural Road No. 81 Nabari Soni Route.

sen.j: 81号名張曽爾線の名張曽爾間は道幅が狭いので要注意である。
sen.e: Careful attention is required when driving between Nabari and Soni on No. 81 Nabari Soni Route, because the road is narrow.
Careful attention is required when driving between Nabari and Soni on No. 81 Nabari Soni Route, because the road is narrow.
Careful attention is required when driving between Nabari and Soni on No. 81 Nabari Soni Route, because the road is narrow.
